p: Antibody d462 has similar on-rate (ka) for both DENV3 and DENV4. Interestingly, mAb d462 has a faster off-rate (kd) for DEN3-80E than for DEN4-80E and shows weaker neutralizing potency for DENV3 (NT50: 0.9476 μg/ml) than for DENV4 (NT50: 0.0029 μg/ml) ( Table 3, Fig 2B). These results suggest that the slow off-rate (kd) of mAb d462 plays a key role in its DENV neutralizing activity.
